titlestmt.titleproper: Finding Aid for the Herman Clarence Nixon Papers

publicationstmt.publisher: Special Collections Manuscripts and Rare Books

repository.corpname: Special Collections Manuscripts and Rare Books

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This ----- collection includes correspondence, diaries, journals where articles were published, etc. Series I contains incoming correspondence that is arranged alphabetically, then by date in the folders. A few pieces of correspondence are written in French and Spanish. Series II contains publications.
Books received with the collection were removed and catalogued.

did.unittitle: American Academy of Political and Social Science
Barber, Emily R. (Mrs. William M. Barber)
First National Bank of Ripley, TN
Louisiana League for the Preservation of Constitutional Rights
Diaries - (2 bound volumes – in English and French)

note.p: [Note: this single bound volume begins April 19, 1918 from the middle of diary to the end of the year. It then begins January 1, 1919 from beginning of the diary to the middle].

did.unittitle: Journals - w/articles by H. C. Nixon
